DTField.Name: TASK
DTField.Label: TASK
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Task reference number.

DTField.Name: TASKTYPE
DTField.Label: TASKTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: E.g. Partial Pick, Full Replenishment etcâ€¦

DTField.Name: STATUS
DTField.Label: STATUS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determined according to the performance of the Task.

DTField.Name: PICKLIST
DTField.Label: PICKLIST
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Pick List according to which a Pick Task was created (if the Task is a pick task).

DTField.Name: CONSIGNEE
DTField.Label: CONSIGNEE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The client for which the Task was created.

DTField.Name: SKU
DTField.Label: SKU
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The SKU that the Task concerns.

DTField.Name: PARALLELPICKLIST
DTField.Label: PARALLELPICKLIST
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Pick List identifier associated with the task.

DTField.Name: REPLENISHMENT
DTField.Label: REPLENISHMENT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Replenishment Task ID.

DTField.Name: FROMLOCATION
DTField.Label: FROMLOCATION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Location from which inventory is to be used to complete the Task.

DTField.Name: FROMLOAD
DTField.Label: FROMLOAD
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Load from which inventory is to be used to complete the Task.

DTField.Name: TOLOCATION
DTField.Label: TOLOCATION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Location to which inventory is to be moved to complete the Task.

DTField.Name: TOLOAD
DTField.Label: TOLOAD
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Load to which inventory is to be moved to complete the Task.

DTField.Name: FROMCONTAINER
DTField.Label: FROMCONTAINER
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Handling Unit to be used to complete the Task.

DTField.Name: ASSIGNED
DTField.Label: ASSIGNED
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determines whether a Task has been assigned or not.

DTField.Name: USERID
DTField.Label: USERID
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The User to which the Task has been assigned.

DTField.Name: TOCONTAINER
DTField.Label: TOCONTAINER
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Handling Unit to be used to complete the Task.

DTField.Name: DOCUMENT
DTField.Label: DOCUMENT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The document (ID) according to which the Task was created.

DTField.Name: DOCUMENTLINE
DTField.Label: DOCUMENTLINE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The document line (ID) according to which the Task was created.

DTField.Name: STARTTIME
DTField.Label: STARTTIME
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The time and date on which the Task began to be performed.

DTField.Name: ENDTIME
DTField.Label: ENDTIME
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The time and date on which the Task was complete.

DTField.Name: ASSIGNEDTIME
DTField.Label: ASSIGNEDTIME
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The time on which the task was assigned to the user.

DTField.Name: EXECUTIONTIME
DTField.Label: EXECUTIONTIME
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The time that took to complete the task.

DTField.Name: STARTLOCATION
DTField.Label: STARTLOCATION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Location in which the task began.

DTField.Name: ASSIGNMENTTYPE
DTField.Label: ASSIGNMENTTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The task assigning method (e.g. manual or automatic).

DTField.Name: EXECUTIONLOCATION
DTField.Label: EXECUTIONLOCATION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The location in which the task was executed.

DTField.Name: PRIORITY
DTField.Label: PRIORITY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The ranking according to which the Task will be released to users.
